data.title: Interview with an angel: Victoria's Secret star Lais Ribeiro gives glamour tips ahead of Glasgow opening
data.meta_description: BRAZILIAN babe Lais Ribeiro has offered her beauty tips ahead of Victoria's Secret's new store opening in Glasgow.
data.text:
The new store opens its doors in Buchanan Street tomorrow.

Lais, 27, has been part of the fashion brand's angels since 2015 and here is what she had to say about the experience.

What is Victoria's Secret?

I get that question a lot. I’m actually not sure – who knows if we’ll ever know!

What do you love about being an angel?

Victoria’s Secret completely changed my career. Being an angel, I’ve become so close with the whole team and the other girls. I’ve also had the opportunity to travel the world with the brand – it’s been a dream.

What are your top glamour tips for wannabe angels?

My biggest glamour tip would be to find your personal style. Everyone is different – whether you’re a jeans and t-shirt girl or a cocktail dress and heels girls – wear what makes you feel good.

How do you know if you're wearing the right fitting bra?

There are a few signs that you’re wearing the right fitting bra, but ultimately your bra should be comfortable. If it is too tight or too loose in areas, you likely need a different fit. That’s why it’s so important to get refit at Victoria’s Secret!

What's your go-to style?

It depends – I like to mix it up. Sometimes I love a cute jumpsuit or dress, and sometimes I love a pair of boyfriend jeans and cool sneakers.

What’s you're best tip for finding the perfect push up bra?

My best tip would be to make sure to try out different styles and colors. Victoria’s Secret has such an amazing selection, it’s almost impossible to not find the perfect push up bra for you.

How many underwear sets do you own?

Too many to count! Victoria’s Secret spoils me

How often do you go for a bra fitting?

Every six months – women’s bodies are always changing so it’s important to do regularly

Have you visited Scotland before?

No, but I’d love to go!
